long_description: With beautiful style and functional details, you can wear the Suncloud Cassandra Polarized Sunglasses directly from your workout to your coffee break and all stops in between. Polarized polycarbonate injection-molded lenses cut glare and offer 100% protection from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Black Backpaint and Blue Print frames have gray polarized lenses; Tortoise frames have brown polarized lenses; both block 85% of visible light. Grilamid frame material; custom metal logo plaques. Base 8 lens curvature wraps for side coverage. Sporty Megol nosepads keep sunglasses securely in place when you're active. The Suncloud Cassandra Polarized Sunglasses best fit medium to large faces.
short_description: With beautiful style and functional details, you can wear the Suncloud Cassandra Polarized Sunglasses directly from your workout to your coffee break and all stops in between.
